title: David Harbour reacts to Hopper in Fortnite because IGN’s Jeffrey always wants to talk Fortnite. #ign
Super Mario RPG Remake - The 22 Best Secrets and Easter Eggs
description: Super Mario RPG is chockfull of neat secrets and easter eggs of both the small and large varieties. Here are our picks for all of the best Super Mario RPG Remake secrets and easter eggs, or at the very least 22 of our absolute favorites, covering everything from the Samus and Link cameos, to one very particular secret boss battle. Spoilers ahead!

title: South Park: Snow Day - Official Gameplay Trailer
description: South Park: Snow Day is an action-adventure RPG game developed by Question Games. Players will embody the new kid in South Park to partake in the legendary Snow Day with Cartman, Stan, Kyle, and Kenny. Being in 3D for the first time in the franchise, players will be able to equip and upgrade devastating melee and ranged weapons in four-player co-op. Dispatch hordes of enemies and bosses with special abilities and powers to wield. South Park: Snow Day is launching soon for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

title: The Marvels - Official 'The Meowvels' Trailer (2023)
description:
Take a look at the latest trailer for The Marvels for the real stars of The Marvels, the Flerken.

Carol Danvers aka Captain Marvel has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. But unintended consequences see Carol shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe. When her duties send her to an anomalous wormhole linked to a Kree revolutionary, her powers become entangled with that of Jersey City super-fan Kamala Khan, aka Ms. Marvel, and Carol’s estranged niece, now S.A.B.E.R. astronaut Captain Monica Rambeau. Together, this unlikely trio must team up and learn to work in concert to save the universe as “The Marvels.” 

The Marvels is directed by Nia DaCosta, and Kevin Feige is the producer. Louis D’Esposito, Victoria Alonso, Mary Livanos and Matthew Jenkins serve as executive producers. The screenplay is by Nia DaCosta and Megan McDonnell and Elissa Karasik. 

The Marvels is in theaters now.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III is getting a new map called MEAT. #cod #mw3 #meat #multiplayer #ign
Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Official King Shark Trailer
description: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is an action online co-op shooter game developed by Rocksteady Studios. Take a look at the latest trailer for the game centered all around King Shark. While gullible and naive, his strength is not to be downplayed wielding heavy weapons like a Gatling gun, to having the ability to jump at extreme heights. Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is launching on February 2, 2024 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

title: Dragonheir X Dungeons & Dragons - Official Drizzt Do‘Urden Trailer
description:
As Dungeons & Dragons's iconic character, Drizzt Do'Urden will now join Dragonheir's adventures and continue the legend with his comrade Guenhwyvar. Watch the video to learn more about it.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Join Dragonheir: Silent Gods, the open-world high-fantasy strategy RPG, and get ready to go on an adventure with @dragonheir.silent.gods and Dungeons & Dragons!

Dragonheir's collaboration with D&D is available to play on Steam, Mac, Windows, Epic, iOS, and Android platforms!

Download Dragonheir NOW:  https://bit.ly/dragonheir-downloadnow

title: Disney’s Wish: Who did the VO better? Ben or Jeffrey? #disney #wish #movie #animation #voiceover #vo
Star Wars' Dave Filoni Gets a Huge Promotion at Lucasfilm - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description:
In today's Fix of entertainment news:

The Star Wars Galaxy will have more input from Dave Filoni moving forward, following his promotion to chief creative officer at Lucasfilm - the Karate Kid galaxy is getting a little bigger, and a new movie’s in the works that’ll see the return of Ralph Macchio and Jackie Chan - and the DC galaxy has found someone to play Jimmy Olsen in Superman: Legacy.

#IGN

title: The Best iPhone 15 Accessories | Budget to Best
description: With the release of the iPhone 15 now well into the past, it's time to take a look at what companies have been up into the category of making your iPhone 15 ownership a more pleasant experience. From the functionally best MagSafe chargers, to cases with the tightest grip, IGN's Budget to Best has you covered with all the best accessories for iPhone 15.

title: Santa Isn't Real - Official Trailer (2023) Scarlett Sperduto, Dana Millican, Kaya Coleman
description:
Check out the trailer for Santa Isn't Real, an upcoming holiday horror movie starring Scarlett Sperduto, Dana Millican, and Kaya Coleman. 

After suffering a brutal attack on Christmas Eve, a young woman, Nikki, struggles to convince her friends that the assailant was none other than Ol' Kris Kringle. When Santa returns to terrorize the group in their remote cabin the next Christmas, Nikki and her friends must overcome disbelief as they fight to stay alive.

Santa Isn't Real, written and directed by Zac Locke, is coming to VOD and Digital Platforms on December 8, 2023, from XYZ Films.

title: Billion-Dollar Lawsuit Against PlayStation Is Allowed to Move Forward - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

PlayStation has a huge lawsuit against them that could cost Sony billions, Ark: Survival Evolved is delayed for PS5 players, and you won’t believe what 17 old game is still getting updates. Ok, I'll give you a hint: it's a Star Wars game.

#IGN #Gaming #PlayStation

title: Skul: The Hero Slayer - Official Demon King's Castle Defense and Mythology Pack Trailer
description:
Check out the action-packed trailer for Skul: The Hero Slayer's latest free update, Demon King's Castle Defense, as well as the upcoming paid Mythology pack DLC. The free content update for Skul brings a new narrative chapter that concludes the story, 30 new enhanced inscriptions, the final true boss, a hidden boss, and the true final ending to the 2D roguelite action platformer game. Additionally, the paid Mythology pack features 5 new Skulls based on famous mythologies, 20 new items, and a new inscription.

#Gaming #IGN

title: PlayStation Pulse Explore Wireless Earbuds Review
description:
Sony’s Pulse Explore Earbuds are laser-focused on, and deliver, high-quality sound for gaming, but that leaves little room for many features that are found in comparable Bluetooth earbuds in this price range.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5

title: Vellum - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Vellum is a cooperative PvE action roguelike game developed by Alvios Games. Players will seek immense power to cast spells to push back a powerful monochromatic foe. In an unprecedented twist for the roguelike genre, players will instead choose the upgrades and abilities for the enemies throughout runs to strategically combat them. Vellum is launching into Steam Early Access in 2024 for PC.

#Vellum

title: Tekken 8 - Official Leo Reveal and Gameplay Trailer
description:
Leo makes a return. Watch the latest trailer for Tekken 8 to see this character in action ahead of the fighting game's release on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC on January 26, 2024.

#Tekken8 #Gaming #IGN

title: Hogwarts Legacy: 10 Talents to Unlock First
description:
Hogwarts Legacy is now available on Nintendo Switch, however, this video was made using the Xbox Series X, PlayStation 5, and PC version of the game.

Early-game combat encounters can feel a bit one-dimensional in Hogwarts Legacy. Thankfully, Talents can help shake up gameplay and empower you to create distinctive builds that complement your playstyle. If you're unsure how to spend your precious points, here are the 10 Talents you should unlock first in Hogwarts Legacy.

00:00 - Intro 
00:21 - Hogwarts Legacy Talents Overview 
01:23 - Confringo Mastery 
01:45 - Glacius Mastery 
02:07 - Knockback Curse 
02:27 - Curse Sapper
02:46 - Avada Kadavra Mastery 
03:08 - Human Demiguise 
03:32 - Maxima Potion Mastery 
03:50 - Stupefy Expertise 
04:11 - Spell Knowledge I, II, and III 
04:33 - Swift 
04:53 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming #HogwartsLegacy

title: Bluey: The Videogame Video Review
description:
Bluey: The Videogame reviewed by Luke Reilly on Xbox Series X. Also available on PlayStation, Xbox One, Switch, and PC.

"Wedged somewhere between Wi-Fi and The Wiggles as one of Australia’s greatest exports, Bluey has been a staggeringly successful animated series. Tens of billions of minutes of the show have been streamed into households in more than 60 countries, and the Heelers have subsequently been transformed into over 1,000 bits of merchandising tat. In an unfortunate turn of events, Bluey: The Videogame feels a lot like another forgettable piece of the latter, hovering somewhere between the countless toys and the tubes of licensed toothpaste. Low on innovation and high on what feels like contractual obligation, Bluey: The Videogame is really a low-effort mobile game masquerading as a mid-price console and PC product. It may absolutely look the part compared to the show itself, but with its assortment of shallow minigames rife with annoying bugs, frustrating controls, and a b

Street Fighter 6 - Official Outfit 3 Showcase Trailer
description: Check out the latest trailer for Street Fighter 6 to see what to expect with Outfit 3. Outfit 3 for the 18 characters at launch will be available in Street Fighter 6 on December 1, 2023. Outfit 3 for the Year 1 characters will be released at the same time as the 4th character: Akuma.

title: IGN records VO for Disney’s new movie Wish! #disney #wish #voiceactor #movie #film #voiceover #adr
Arken Age - Official Reveal Trailer
description:
Explore the fantasy world of Arken Age and see various creatures you'll take on and more in this trailer for the upcoming VR action-adventure game. Arken Age is set in the Bio-Chasm—a terraformed fantasy world created by the Grand Arborist. In Arken Age, engage in full physics combat using Arkenite infused swords & guns—and freely explore the densely filled environments under siege by Hyperion's neural corruption.

Arken Age will be available on Steam and PlayStation VR2.
